This is a text-to-speech browser extension that utilizes Microsoft Edge's Online TTS service. It offers several notable features:

1. Natural Sounding Voices: The extension provides high-quality, natural-sounding voices for a more engaging and enjoyable listening experience.

2. Multiple Language Support: It supports a wide range of languages, allowing users to listen to text in their preferred language or translate text into different languages.

3. Context Menu Item: The extension integrates a context menu item, enabling users to quickly and easily convert selected text into spoken audio with just a right-click.

4. Download Generated Audio File: Users have the option to download the generated audio files.

5. Advanced Controls: The extension offers advanced controls for adjusting the rate, pitch, and volume of the generated speech.

6. Free for Personal and Commercial Use: The generated audio files are free to use for both personal and commercial purposes.

7. User-friendly Interface: The extension features a user-friendly interface that is easy to navigate and use. The extension provides language and country auto-complete functionality, making it quick and convenient for users to select the desired language or country for text conversion.
